Step right up, and let me explain how this whole thing works.

You place bets with me: I take gold tickets in batches of 50, so that's a minimum bet of 50 tickets. You can bet up to 3,000 tickets at one time.

If you bet on the winning monster, you win an amount determined by your initial bet, the tickets placed on the losing monster, and the total number of winners. If no one bet on the losing monster, you at least win your initial bet once over.

So, what'll it be?
